nodes.text: The Coruscant Security Alert was a notice distributed by the Coruscant Security Force during the Cold War. It would allow Coruscant Security to inform the public of threats and offer bounties for the capture of various criminals. In one case, a bounty was offered for the Fondor Five, a criminal gang composed of Basher, Burnout, Chopper, Gutshot, and Longeye.

The Coruscant Security Alert appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic. It can be accessed from a computer terminal in the Old Galactic Market. The player can choose to either accept or decline the bounty offered for the capture of the gang.
